recipesJson.name: Guava burst
recipesJson.author: Tvsty1
recipesJson.description:
Super simple guava & grapefruit.

Cap sweet guava & wf Malaysian Guava is the perfect combo for a ripe guava.

Flv pink guava & Cape grapefruit use for our grapefruit note.
I wouldn't normally push punk guava that high but In this recipe it pushes the whole flavour to another level. 

Super sweet is optional

Shake n vape is okay but give it a few days for the grapefruit to settle down slightly.

reviews.text:
Very enyoble recipe! AlthoughI had to make this recipe without the Malaysian guava.
Afterwards I added 1% of vt honey pomelo. Gives it another push towards the grapefruit.
This looks like it works really well. Be making this after my next order
